Job Description: • Perform outbound call and use social platform to contact customer (list provided) in order to retain existing customer.• To be an interface between the customer and internal support teams to ensure that the customer receives the best possible service from the company.• Provide excellent customer services and ensure customer satisfaction.• To contribute in team effort by accomplishing related results as needed individually and as a team player with the guidance and coaching of your Team Manager.• Team player with a strong desire to be an active, long-term participant in the growth of the career path• Ability to learn quickly, make an immediate impact, and provide value-added service to our clients.	• High energy and enthusiasm, with a strong commitment to exceeding client expectations.• Strong communication and interpersonal skills, displaying the ability to connect and build relationship with clients and peers.• Analyze customer feedbacks and develop new techniques with the intent of increasing customer loyalty and retention.• Prepare working report and perform analysis to evaluate the effectiveness of retention programs.

Job Description: ● Responsible for the search engine optimization of the company's and client's website.● Maintain company's and client's website position as high as possible in competitive keywords.● Perform keyword analysis, On-page SEO & Off-page SEO websites.● Manage content (Identifying and organizing content opportunities)● Provide new SEO ideas and suggestions frequently.● Responsible for website promotion, monitoring and research competitors, statistics of relevant data.● Participate in and cooperate with various alliances to enhance the traffic and popularity of the website.● Keep up with the latest search engine algorithms and ranking methods.● Incorporate SEO understanding into the stages of software development life cycle.● Analyze high volumes of data on a daily basis.
Job Requirement: ● Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree, Advertising/Media, e-Commerce, Mass Communications, Marketing, Information Technology or equivalent.● Required language(s): Bahasa Indonesia & English● Preferably with 2 to 3 years of working experience in SEO.● Required Skill(s): On-page SEO, Off-page SEO, CSS & other technical SEO skills.● Excellent command in spoken and written Khmer & English.● Internet-savvy and comfortable working with numbers & charts.● Able to work independently with minimal supervision.● Knowledge in web design and HTML is an added advantage.

Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Job Description:
1. To control material quantity is paralleled with purchase requisition (PR) & BoM
2. Prepare report on potential materials to ensure the actual requirement of material is prepared
3. Implement Warehouse Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) is efficiency
4. Monitor slow moving items are highly control efficiency
5. Adhere all materials are allocated based on items category and proper spaces
6. Prepare re-order level to fulfill the quantity of goods as required
7. Aware of non-usage items ensuring that those are used
8. Monitor or do spot check over physical material
9. Provide feedback and coaching purposes regarding operator error to warehouse team
10. Oversee all inventory transactions are performed and updated properly in the system
11. Control inventory report on time
Job Requirement:
1.	កំរិតនៃការអប់រំ /Education Qualification
•	Bachelor’s/Associate degree

2.	បទពិសោធន៍ការងារនិងចំណេះដឹង /Work Experience & Knowledge
•	Over 2 years of work experience in Warehouse
•	2-3 years of work experience in management level
•	Good in English Language
•	MS Office & Email

3.	ជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស /Technical Skills

•	Good at FIFO and LIFO and FEFO methods
•	Good knowledge of 5s implementation strategy
•	Knowledge in project management, planning skills
•	Good knowledge of storage and organizing

4.	ជំនាញទន់ /Soft Skills

•	Good at communication and interpersonal skills
•	Leadership and management skills
•	Motivation/Problem solving skills

Company Profile:
AEON MALL is the Japan’s Largest Specialist Shopping Mall Developer. We not only develop but also operate over 150 shopping malls throughout Japan and other countries. On expanding retail business across Asia, AEON MALL has opened our third biggest shopping mall in 2022.

Job Description:
•	Record fixed asset by creating and supervising a system procedure, forms and controls. 
•	Recommend any updates to accounting policies affecting fixed assets to management. 
•	Allocate tag numbers to fixed assets to effectively track them from time to time. 
•	Record in the accounting system newly acquired fixed assets and those disposed. 
•	Perform depreciation calculation for all fixed assets. 
•	Find out fixed assets 'obsolescence potential. 
•	Carry out inventory counts of fixed assets physically. 
•	Recommend fixed assets that should be disposed off to management. 
•	Create fixed asset related audit schedules, and collaborate with auditors on their assignments. 
•	Perform property tax returns report. 
•	Serve as company representative at any audits relating to fixed asset.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor degree in Accounting or other relevant fields; 
•	At least 1-2 years’ experience in fixed assets 
•	Strong knowledge and experience of fixed assets and General Ledger. 
•	Possess strong proficiency in Excel. 
•	Strong communication and analytical skills. 
•	Strong ability to work individually or in a team setting. 
•	Excellent interpersonal and time management skills to meet time-sensitive deadlines. 
•	Good oral and written English Language. 
•	Be honest and trustworthy. 
•	Hard work and be able to work under pressure. 
•	Be patient, self-motivated and team building capabilities. 
•	Team work, interpersonal, customer service skill and strong communication skill. 
•	Be able to work with shift schedule (including weekend and public holiday).
Company Profile:
AEON MALL is the Japan’s Largest Specialist Shopping Mall Developer. We not only develop but also operate over 150 shopping malls throughout Japan and other countries. On expanding retail business across Asia, AEON MALL has opened our third biggest shopping mall in 2022.

Job Description: - Read and publicize all official memo(s) to students, attend all meetings and orientation at the beginning and/or throughout the term (meetings and orientation are mandatory).- Teach Literacy and numeracy along with personal, social and emotional skills.- Employ a variety of instructional techniques and teaching strategies to meet different aptitudes and interests of students, including whole group/ small group or individual learning.- Follow course syllabus provided by Aii Language Center.- Help with the integration of technology into the classroom, helping set up computers and projectors, for example.- Be well planned for her/ his class. Design and follow a complete teaching plan.- Initiate, plan, organize, and participate in activities, including extracurricular activities, training, and workshops (extracurricular activity is mandatory if required).- Work in collaboration with Aii Language Center management team.- Assist in developing a curriculum that takes an overall approach to English/Chinese study and focus on a specific aspect of language use.- Teach students English/Chinese skills, such as listening, reading, writing and speaking.- Establish and maintain communication between parents of students and the school in the program.- Engage parents and families in their student’s learning and acting as an ambassador for the school in the community.- Contribute productively to the school as a whole.- Write student report cards using the online continuous assessment with their overall performance.- Organize learning materials and resources.- Use a variety of activities and instructional methods.- Assess student’s performance and progress to ensure they are mastering the skills on regular basis.- Monitor children’s interactions and nurture cooperation and sharing.- Follow and comply with teaching standards.- Establish and enforce rules for behavior, and procedures for maintaining order.- Adapt teaching methods and instructional materials to meet students’ varying needs and interests.- And other duties as assigned.

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description:
• Follow and maintains knowledge of all school policies and procedures.
• Perform general office duties including answering multi-line phones, routing telephone calls or messages to appropriate staff, greeting the public, typing, proofreading, filing, sorting and handling incoming and outgoing mail, as needed.
• Research, create, input, format, organize and edit relevant data as needed or requested and prepare in a usable format for the school.
• Completes a high volume of computer work, using school computer and programs, to input a high volume of data with speed and accuracy, including confidential data, in an environment with constant interruptions.
• Processes and tracks employee timesheets and work with the personnel officer and the HRD for approval.
• Assists in preparing school materials (i.e., brochures, newsletters, learning materials etc.).
• Reconciles account balances and financial documentation (Request form, cash receipts, and approval) ensuring accuracy.
• Independently or in accordance with general instruction, composes correspondence on a wide range of subjects, requiring knowledge of procedures and policies of the assigned area.
• Serves as receptionist and gives information or directs visitors and parents to appropriate offices, as needed.
• Answers inquiries concerning standardized policies, procedures, and regulations.
• Coordinates scheduling of meetings, appointments and travel and assists with all other administrative needs.
• Schedules conferences, programs, events and teachers individual schedule as required including creating schedules, contacting all invited parties, preparing confirmation and distributing materials to teachers.
• Places orders for all classroom and office supplies, as needed or requested.
• Professionally represents the school and the District in interactions with parents, community, staff and students.
• Maintains appropriate certifications and training hours as required.
• Attends work regularly and is punctual.
• Supervise academic secretary
• Check and process the sick and annual leave
• Process and confirm teacher and staff probation with HR
• Monitor and report the monthly teacher tardiness
• Arrange and monitor with the personnel officer the teacher written test
• Help and arrange the teacher interview with the personnel officer.
• Work and check with the personnel officer the in and out process of the teachers
• Work with Personnel officer and Submit the monthly staff movement:
• Promotion
• Change position
• Change campus
• Change working hours
• Suspension, fire, lay off, ditch
• Write and keep Aii Academic Secretary history record (All Campuses)
• Update Academic and secretary staff details
• Ensure and evaluate all teaching materials and equipment are in good condition.
• Ensure and maintain the order of the academic office
• Maintain records and files especially teachers and other staff CVs
• Write and submit history of the academic events every month
• Process new teacher and academic staff the username, email and MJQ server etc.
• Other assigned tasks
Job Requirement:
• A bachelor degree in Education/Administration or related fields
• Excellent problem solving skills, and able to use initiative
• Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views
• Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks
• An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude
• Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media
• Ability to understand and keep within a budget
• Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English
• Strong administrative and organizational skills

**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖
•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ
•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ
• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ
•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក
•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ
•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារ

សូមភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថតបច្ចុប្បន្នភាព 4x6។

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Job Description: - Plan and execute all digital marketing, including SEO/SEM, marketing database, email, social media and display advertising campaigns.- Design, build and maintain the social media presence.- Measure and report performance of all digital marketing campaigns, and assess goals (ROI and KPIs).- Identify trends and insights, and optimize spend and performance based on the insights.- Brainstorm new and creative growth strategies.- Plan, execute, and measure experiments and conversion tests.- Collaborate with internal teams to create landing pages and optimize user experience.- Utilize strong analytical ability to evaluate end-to-end customer experience across multiple channels and customer touch points.- Instrument conversion points and optimize user funnels.- Collaborate with agencies and other vendor partners.- Evaluate emerging technologies. Provide thought leadership and perspective for adoption where appropriate.- Develop and implement social media strategy and maximise profile across allactivities. - Maintain our social media presence.- Measuring and reporting on the performance of all digital marketing campaigns.- Work with the marketing team to identify content opportunities and produce therelevant materials (news items, thought leadership, podcasts, blogs, infographics etc.)and disseminate in the most appropriate digital channel. - Act as a ‘brand ambassador’ to promote the correct use of the brand bothinternally and externally through digital channels.- Record activities relevant to members on Sales and Marketing Manager.- Assist and project manage specific projects allocated according to the plan.- Identify digital trends and evaluate emerging technologies, use these to inform andevolve Aii’s core activities and outputs as well as dissemination plans. - Other tasks assigned by President/Vice Presidents.
Job Requirement: - BSc in Marketing, Communications, Journalism or relevant field- At least 2-plus years of communications, marketing or public relations or related experience- BS/MS degree in marketing or a related field.- Proven working experience in digital marketing.- Demonstrable experience leading and managing SEO/SEM, marketing database, email, social media and/or display advertising campaigns.- Highly creative with experience in identifying target audiences and devising digital campaigns that engage, inform and motivate.- Experience in optimizing landing pages and user funnels- Experience with A/B and multivariate experiments- Working knowledge of ad serving tools (e.g., DART, Atlas)- Experience in setting up and optimizing Google Adwords campaigns- Strong analytical skills and data-driven thinking.- Up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in online marketing and measurement

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: Academics - Assist in the curriculum and syllabus review, overhaul and development- Assist in the organization of student testing and placement- Support in guiding newly qualified teachers in preparing lessons- Implement and maintain academic procedures and records such as observations, teacher opinion survey, buddy system and others- Effectively manage and organize the materials, resources, examinations and assessments as provided by Aii- Deal with student and group leader enquiries and issues on academic matters- Design and ensure the supervision and discipline of students- Carry out lesson observations and provide oral and written feedback to teachers; forward feedback documentation to the Deputy Campus Director- Provide support to teachers in their teaching, classroom management, and assessments to students- Work to ensure the academic and recreational aspects of the program are integrated- Teach as required to meet operational demands e.g. teacher absence, increased/decreased student numbers- Dress appropriately at all times, in line with the Aii dress code- Submit reports, follow-up, and information regarding any academic related tasksManagement - Support the Director of Studies and other managers at the center in the overall management of the center - Maintain accurate staff records - Ensure that the school committee meets the desired standards - Assist the school committee in the set-up of the center and ensure all resources are kept properly- Organize meetings, trainings and workshops on request. These might include an overview to the Aii academic program, current teaching methodology refreshers or language classesRegular/daily tasks:The following regular tasks will be divided and assigned by the Director of Studies.- Adult Program New Curriculum- Kid Program New Curriculum- Pre-kid Program current curriculum- AIS Full Day New Curriculum- New Teacher and Observation- Teacher Observation- Teacher Observation Feedback- Teacher Opinion Survey- Peer to peer assessment- MyELT Online Workbook (Teacher and student accounts)- QSkills Online (Teacher and student accounts)- Sponsorship Program- Online Continuous Assessment- the current forms, tracking system and procedures- Professional Development- Curriculum updates and development- Teacher Website - Teacher Handbook - Annual Excellence in Teaching Award- The current process is with Johnny- Checking and maintaining one CSR especially in terms of academics- Coordinate in and out extra-curricular activities for students and teachers- Verbal and Written reports- Create and monitor school policies - Other assigned tasks or projects that are relevant to academics.
Job Requirement: #NAME?
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• To ensure that Aii meets the necessary legislative obligations.
• To act as advisor to Aii through the Human Resources, and directly to School Committee, Departments and individuals on staff matters.
• To facilitate the ongoing development of innovative policies and practices and to ensure that staffs are complying all the school policies.
• To undertake an organizational role in coordinating and embedding a positive safety culture across the school and the staff.
• To provide regular reports and advice to Aii Committee.
• To enable the development and delivery of training to meet the needs of the school and other departments, including instructing departmental coordinators.
• To be a key point of contact to staff responsible for staffing
• To put in place measures to audit, monitor and review staff documentation compliance and performances.
• To enable the investigation of accidents and compilation of accident data; to co-operate with staff responsible for insurance and other related matters.
• To assist in promoting solutions to issues throughout the school by active participation in committees.
• To advise the school on developments in legislation and best practice which may impact upon the betterment of the school and staff safety.
• To undertake such other reasonable duties as may be allocated by the President of Aii Language Center.
Job Requirement:
• Monthly salary addition and deduction
• Confirm teacher and staff probation with HR
• Monthly teacher tardiness
• Teacher absence record
• Salary Advance
• Assign teacher under supervision
• Work permit
• Staff Details
• Staff requisition
• Shortlist CV
• Teacher writing test
• Teacher interview
• CV cover record
• Teacher and staff contract renewal
• Check out process
• Timesheet process
• Sick leave and annual leave check
• Monthly staff movement

**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖
•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ
•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ
• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ
•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក
•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ
•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារ

សូមភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថតបច្ចុប្បន្នភាព 4x6។

Job Description:
Overall Purpose of the Role:
To involve a creative and systematic plan to solve a problem or achieve certain objectives, with the use of images, symbols or even words. It is visual communication and the aesthetic expression of concepts and ideas.


➢ Shoot and record videos of interviews and school events for Aii Language Centers.
➢ Organize digital footage with video-editing software
➢ Review storyline and script to create a shot decision list based on scenes’value
➢ Collaborate with the director and others who are involved in film making.
➢ Other tasks will be assigned by President.
Job Requirement:
EDUCATION:
➢ A degree in film studies, cinematography or related field
➢ Proven work experience as a Cameraman and Video Editor
➢ Creative mind and storytelling skills
➢ Familiarity with special effects and 3D animation
➢ Computer Knowledge

KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE:
➢ Excellent problem solving skills, and able to use initiative
➢ Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views
➢ Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks
➢ An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude
➢ Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media
➢ Ability to understand and keep within a budget
➢ Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English
➢ Strong administrative and organizational skills

** Only shortlisted applicants will be contacted within 7 working-day

Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
Overall Purpose of the Role:
To involve a creative and systematic plan to solve a problem or achieve certain objectives, with the use of images, symbols or even words. It is visual communication and the aesthetic expression of concepts and ideas.


➢ Shoot and record videos of interviews and school events for Aii Language Centers.
➢ Organize digital footage with video-editing software
➢ Review storyline and script to create a shot decision list based on scenes’value
➢ Collaborate with the director and others who are involved in film making.
➢ Other tasks will be assigned by President.
Job Requirement:
EDUCATION:
➢ A degree in film studies, cinematography or related field
➢ Proven work experience as a Cameraman and Video Editor
➢ Creative mind and storytelling skills
➢ Familiarity with special effects and 3D animation
➢ Computer Knowledge

KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE:
➢ Excellent problem solving skills, and able to use initiative
➢ Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views
➢ Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks
➢ An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude
➢ Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media
➢ Ability to understand and keep within a budget
➢ Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English
➢ Strong administrative and organizational skills

Job Description:
1.1.1 Import
1) Daily communication with Customers, Shipping lines and Freight forwarders etc...
2) Follow up the shipment status (ETA) and update to customers on time.
3) Prepare import document to apply at Customs House.
4) Ensure the container delivery to customer upon shipment arrival.
5) Prepare weekly import report.
6) Have knowledge of import shipment with CDC/Master list.
7) Other tasks assigned by superior

1.1.2 Export
1) Daily communication with Customers, Shipping lines and Freight forwarders etc...
2) Booking container truck for loading.
3) Prepare draft BL to Shipping lines & Freight forwarders.
4) Update shipment status to customers.
5) Prepare weekly export report.
6) Key in all the expense invoices in the system and submit all invoices to accounts within the timeline.
7) Other tasks assigned by supervisor
Job Requirement:
1) Bachelor Degree in Business Administration, Logistics or other related fields.
2) Good command of English
3) At least 2-3 years of experience in Logistics Industry.
4) Good attitude and be able to work under pressure

** Main Tasks (Describe the main tasks to be completed)
• Oversee and manage the general accounting functions, including : accounts payable, accounts receivable, general ledger, and taxes.
• Overseeing the daily activities of the accounting department and ensuring that all major projects, month-end, and year-end reports are completed accurately and on time.
• Assess current practices and procedures and make recommendations for improvements.
• Develop staff by managing performance, setting goals, providing ongoing training, and maintaining strong employee relationships.
• Verify payments before processing for cash disbursements.
• Manage account receivables, account payables ,Bank reconciliation, fixed assets register, and cash flows

• Preparing and reviewing financial budget plan.
• Sign acknowledged on journal voucher before submitting to GM
• Initiate more or new controls when there is weakness or e risk in current practices
• Monitors and analyzes department work to develop more efficient procedures and use of resources while maintaining a high level of accuracy.
• Prepare for internal financial audit and coordinate the audit process.
• Assess staff performance, effectively communicate with them, and maintain a positive working relationship when addressing problems and coming up with solutions
• Handle personnel issues relating to staff conflicts, performance issues, etc.
• Liaise between staffs and management
• Provide training both soft and hard skill to team.
• Other tasks assigned by GM.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s or master’s degree in Accounting or Finance. CPA or MBA preferred.
• Advanced Microsoft Excel skills. Experience with other financial systems.
• 5+ years of progressive accounting experience with a portion of it being in a supervisory role
• Good in English speaking and writing.
• Ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously and effectively in a complex environment.
• Attention to detail and the ability to analyze large amounts of data.
• Excellent verbal and written communication abilities across all levels of an organization
• Strong leadership skills with a dedication to driving and achieving results
• Knowledge of employee relationship building and performance management techniques

** Highly responsible for work completion with accuracy and within deadline.

job title: បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកគិតលុយ (សាខាផ្សារធំថ្មី)
company_name: ហាងនំបុ័ងបាយ័ន Bayon Bakery
position: បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកគិតលុយ (សាខាផ្សារធំថ្មី)
Job Description: •  ចេញវិក័យលក់ជូនភ្ញៀវនិងកត់ត្រាចំណូលប្រចាំថ្ងៃ•  បញ្ចូលទិន្នន័យទំនិញលក់ចូលទៅក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធលក់អោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ•  ត្រូវមានជំនាញលើការត្រួតពិនិត្យលើក្រដាសប្រាក់ និង មានទេពកោសល្យ ក្នុងការគិតលេខ•  ត្រូវធ្វើការផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់អោយបានច្បាស់លាស់លើ បរិមាណ និងតម្លៃរបស់ទំនិញ នីមួយៗ នៅពេលដែលអតិថិជនគិតប្រាក់•  ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការរាប់សាច់ប្រាក់ជាក់ស្តែងជាមួយទិន្នន័យលក់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ•  ត្រូវចេះផ្តល់ជាយោបល់ ឬការណែនាំជូនដល់អតិថិជន អំពីផលិតផលថ្មីៗ ដែលមាននៅក្នុងហាង• ត្រូវមានភាពតស៊ូ ព្យាយាម ជាមួយនឹងការងារ
Job Requirement: •  ត្រូវបញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាផ្នែក ទុតិយភូមិឬ ក្នុងឆ្នាំសិក្សាបរិញ្ញាបត្រ គណនេយ្យ ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ និងធនាគារ និងសញ្ញាបត្រដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធកាន់តែប្រសើរ•  មិនត្រូវការបទពិសោធន៍ បើមានរឹតតែល្អ•  ត្រូវមានភាពរហ័សរហួនក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា ដែលបានកើតឡើងចំពោះមុខ និងផ្តល់ដំណោះសមហេតុផលជូនអតិថិជន•  មានក្រមសីលធម៏វិជ្ជាជីវះជាបេឡាករ និង មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់• អាចធ្វើការប្តូរវេនតាមការចាត់ចែងរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនម៉ោងការងារ- ធ្វើការ៦ថ្ងៃ/សប្តាហ៏ ឈប់សំរាក១ថ្ងៃក្នុងមួយសប្តាហ៏- ម៉ោងការងារ វេណព្រឹក ម៉ោង០៥:០០ព្រឹក ដល់ម៉ោង០១:០០រសៀល- វេណថ្ងៃ ម៉ោង០១:០០រសៀល ដល់ម៉ោង០៩:០០យប់- អាចជ្រើសរើសទៅធ្វើការតាមសាខាបាន ដូចជា ​ សាខាជ្រោយចង្វា សាខាព្រែកព្នៅជាដើម។អត្ថប្រយោជន៏- ផ្តល់ជូនអាហារមួយពេល- ទទួលបានការចូលរួមវគ្គសិក្ខាសាលា វគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងកម្មវិធីបំពាក់បំប៉នផ្សេងៗ- មានឱកាសឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្ស តាមសមត្ថភាពការងារ និងបទពិសោធ- កម្មវិធីជប់លៀងបុគ្គលិកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ- អត្ថប្រយោជផ្សេងៗទៀត
Company Profile: Bayon Bakery is a local and one of the leading bakeries in Cambodia and was established in 1998. In order to fulfill customer's demands, we have expanded our stores to 12 branches in Phnom Penh with our signature Num Pang Bayon, Bakyong Bayon, cake, wedding cake, and a wide range of fresh baked products.

job title: បុគ្គលិកលក់ក្នុងហាង (សាខាផ្លូវជាតិលេខ3)
company_name: ហាងនំបុ័ងបាយ័ន Bayon Bakery
position: បុគ្គលិកលក់ក្នុងហាង (សាខាផ្លូវជាតិលេខ3)
Job Description:
ទំនួលខុសត្រូវការងារ
- រៀបចំទីកន្លែងសម្រាប់ដាក់តាំងផលិតផលលក់
- ពិនិត្យមើលឧបករណ៏សំភារៈក្នុងហាង
- សំអាតទីកន្លែងលក់ខាងក្នុង និងខាងក្រៅហាង
- ទទួលនំតាមកាលកំណត់លក់
- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ចំពោះការងារ
- មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ចំពោះអតិថិជនគ្រប់ប្រភេទ
- ធ្វើកិច្ចការផ្សេងៗដែលតម្រូវដោយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង
Job Requirement:
​  តម្រូវការការងារ
- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និង រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់
- មានជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនងបានល្អ
- សិស្សដែលបានបញ្ចប់បាក់ឌុប និងនិស្សិតសិក្សានៅឆ្នាំទី១ ឬទី២ ត្រូវបានលើកទឹកចិត្តឲ្យដាក់ពាក្យ
- ចេះប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ (Microsoft Word & Excel)
- មិនត្រូវការបទពិសោធន៍ (ប្រសិនជាមានកាន់តែប្រសើរ)
- មានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការរៀនពីការងារ ឧស្សាហ៏ព្យាយាម និងឱ្យតម្លៃការងារ
- ធ្លាប់យល់ដឹងនិងរៀនពីការងារនេះខ្លះៗកាន់តែប្រសើរ
- ផ្តល់ប្រាក់លើកទឹកចិត្តបន្ថែម
- មានការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលការងារជូន មុនចូលធ្វើការ

ម៉ោងការងារ
- ធ្វើការ៦ថ្ងៃ/សប្តាហ៏ ឈប់សំរាក១ថ្ងៃក្នុងមួយសប្តាហ៏
- ម៉ោងការងារ​ វេណព្រឹក ម៉ោង០៥:០០ព្រឹក ដល់ម៉ោង០១:០០រសៀល
            វេណល្ងាច ម៉ោង០១:០០រសៀល ដល់ម៉ោង០៩:០០យប់
- អាចជ្រើសរើសទៅធ្វើការតាមសាខាបាន ដូចជា សាខាស្តាតចាស់ សាខាផ្សារថ្មី​ សាខាឬស្សីកែវ សាខាព្រែកព្នៅជាដើម។ 

អត្ថប្រយោជន៏
- ការធានារ៉ាប់រងការងារ(បសស)
- ផ្តល់ជូនអាហារមួយពេល
- ទទួលបានការចូលរួមវគ្គសិក្ខាសាលា វគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងកម្មវិធីបំពាក់បំប៉នផ្សេងៗ
- មានឱកាសឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្ស តាមសមត្ថភាពការងារ និងបទពិសោធ
- កម្មវិធីជប់លៀងបុគ្គលិកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
- អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗទៀត

មានតែបេក្ខជនដែលជាប់ក្នុងបញ្ជីសម្រាំងប៉ុណ្ណោះនឹងត្រូវបានទាក់ទងសម្រាប់ការសំភាសន៍។ សូមផ្ញើរប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប និងលិខិតចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ របស់អ្នកទុកជាឯកសារមួយ។ ដាក់ឈ្មោះឯកសាររបស់អ្នកដូចតទៅ: ឈ្មោះ_មុខដំណែងស្នើសុំ_កាលបរិច្ឆេទដាក់ពាក្យ (ឈ្មោះ = ឈ្មោះពេញរបស់អ្នក) ។ ឧទាហរណ៏: លី ដារ៉ា_បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកលក់_ថ្ងៃទី30 ខែកក្កដា ឆ្នាំ2019។ សូមភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនឹងអត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណ សំបុត្រកំណើត និងសៀវភៅគ្រួសារដែលមានភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប និងលិខិតចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍។
Company Profile: Bayon Bakery is a local and one of the leading bakeries in Cambodia and was established in 1998. In order to fulfill customer's demands, we have expanded our stores to 12 branches in Phnom Penh with our signature Num Pang Bayon, Bakyong Bayon, cake, wedding cake, and a wide range of fresh baked products.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Chivorn Administration Manager 070555337 Chivorn@bayonbakery.com House 042K, Street 598, Sangkat Toul Sangke, KhanRersey Keo, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 070555337

job title: បុគ្គលិកលក់ក្នុងហាង (សាខាផ្សារធំថ្មី)
company_name: ហាងនំបុ័ងបាយ័ន Bayon Bakery
position: បុគ្គលិកលក់ក្នុងហាង (សាខាផ្សារធំថ្មី)
Job Description:
ទំនួលខុសត្រូវការងារ
- រៀបចំទីកន្លែងសម្រាប់ដាក់តាំងផលិតផលលក់
- ពិនិត្យមើលឧបករណ៏សំភារៈក្នុងហាង
- សំអាតទីកន្លែងលក់ខាងក្នុង និងខាងក្រៅហាង
- ទទួលនំតាមកាលកំណត់លក់
- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ចំពោះការងារ
- មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ចំពោះអតិថិជនគ្រប់ប្រភេទ
- ធ្វើកិច្ចការផ្សេងៗដែលតម្រូវដោយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង
Job Requirement:
​  តម្រូវការការងារ
- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និង រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់
- មានជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនងបានល្អ
- សិស្សដែលបានបញ្ចប់បាក់ឌុប និងនិស្សិតសិក្សានៅឆ្នាំទី១ ឬទី២ ត្រូវបានលើកទឹកចិត្តឲ្យដាក់ពាក្យ
- ចេះប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ (Microsoft Word & Excel)
- មិនត្រូវការបទពិសោធន៍ (ប្រសិនជាមានកាន់តែប្រសើរ)
- មានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការរៀនពីការងារ ឧស្សាហ៏ព្យាយាម និងឱ្យតម្លៃការងារ
- ធ្លាប់យល់ដឹងនិងរៀនពីការងារនេះខ្លះៗកាន់តែប្រសើរ
- ផ្តល់ប្រាក់លើកទឹកចិត្តបន្ថែម
- មានការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលការងារជូន មុនចូលធ្វើការ

ម៉ោងការងារ
- ធ្វើការ៦ថ្ងៃ/សប្តាហ៏ ឈប់សំរាក១ថ្ងៃក្នុងមួយសប្តាហ៏
- ម៉ោងការងារ​ វេណព្រឹក ម៉ោង០៥:០០ព្រឹក ដល់ម៉ោង០១:០០រសៀល
            វេណល្ងាច ម៉ោង០១:០០រសៀល ដល់ម៉ោង០៩:០០យប់
- អាចជ្រើសរើសទៅធ្វើការតាមសាខាបាន ដូចជា សាខាស្តាតចាស់ សាខាផ្សារថ្មី​ សាខាឬស្សីកែវ សាខាព្រែកព្នៅជាដើម។ 

អត្ថប្រយោជន៏
- ការធានារ៉ាប់រងការងារ(បសស)
- ផ្តល់ជូនអាហារមួយពេល
- ទទួលបានការចូលរួមវគ្គសិក្ខាសាលា វគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងកម្មវិធីបំពាក់បំប៉នផ្សេងៗ
- មានឱកាសឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្ស តាមសមត្ថភាពការងារ និងបទពិសោធ
- កម្មវិធីជប់លៀងបុគ្គលិកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
- អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗទៀត

មានតែបេក្ខជនដែលជាប់ក្នុងបញ្ជីសម្រាំងប៉ុណ្ណោះនឹងត្រូវបានទាក់ទងសម្រាប់ការសំភាសន៍។ សូមផ្ញើរប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប និងលិខិតចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ របស់អ្នកទុកជាឯកសារមួយ។ ដាក់ឈ្មោះឯកសាររបស់អ្នកដូចតទៅ: ឈ្មោះ_មុខដំណែងស្នើសុំ_កាលបរិច្ឆេទដាក់ពាក្យ (ឈ្មោះ = ឈ្មោះពេញរបស់អ្នក) ។ ឧទាហរណ៏: លី ដារ៉ា_បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកលក់_ថ្ងៃទី30 ខែកក្កដា ឆ្នាំ2019។ សូមភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនឹងអត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណ សំបុត្រកំណើត និងសៀវភៅគ្រួសារដែលមានភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប និងលិខិតចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍។
Company Profile: Bayon Bakery is a local and one of the leading bakeries in Cambodia and was established in 1998. In order to fulfill customer's demands, we have expanded our stores to 12 branches in Phnom Penh with our signature Num Pang Bayon, Bakyong Bayon, cake, wedding cake, and a wide range of fresh baked products.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  070555337 hr@bayonbakery.com House 042K, Street 598, Sangkat Toul Sangke, KhanRersey Keo, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 070555337

job title: អ្នកបើកបររថយន្ត
company_name: ហាងនំបុ័ងបាយ័ន Bayon Bakery
position: អ្នកបើកបររថយន្ត
Job Description: ទំនួលខុសត្រូវការងារ-បើកបរដឹកជញ្ជូននំ និង ទំនិញផ្សេងៗទៅតាមសាខា ក្នុងរាជធានីភ្នំពេញ ប្រកបដោយ សុវត្ថិភាព និងគោរពច្បាប់ចរាចរណ៍- ត្រួតពិនិត្យឡានជាប្រចាំ មានដូចជា ប្រេងម៉ាស៊ីន ទឹក ប្រាំង ចង្កូត កង់ឡាន មុននឹងចេញដំណើរ ព្រមទាំងត្រួតពិនិត្យជាប្រចាំ តាមកាលវិភាគកំណត់របស់ប្រធានផ្នែកប្រតិបត្តិការ- ត្រូវរាប់ និងផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ទំនិញឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ មុនពេលលើកទំនិញដាក់រថយន្ត និងរក្សាទំនិញក្នុងកន្លែងផ្ទុកឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ- រាយការណ៍ភ្លាមៗមកកាន់ប្រធានក្រុមក្នុងករណីមានបញ្ហាកើតឡើងនៅពេលដឹកជញ្ជូន-ទទួលការងារផ្សេងទៀតតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ប្រធានក្រុម ឬអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង និង ថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំ។
Job Requirement: តម្រូវការការងារ-ចេះអានអក្សរខ្មែរបាន-ត្រូវមានប័ណ្ណបើកបរត្រឹមត្រូវស្របតាមច្បាប់-ត្រូវមានជំនាញនិងបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិចមួយឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ-មានការយល់ដឹងអំពីច្បាប់ចរាចរណ៍ផ្លូវគោកតម្រូវការ-មានការប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងល្អ និងអាចបត់បែនទៅលើម៉ោងធ្វើការបាន-មានភាពអត់ធ្មត់ និងឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាមក្នុងការងារ។-អាចធ្វើការជាក្រុម ម្នាក់ឯង និងអាចធ្វើការងារក្រោមសំពាធបាន។-មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់នៅពេលបើកបរ(បើកបរដោយប្រុងប្រយ័ត្នខ្ពស់និងប្រកបដោយស្មារតីទទួលខុសត្រូវ)។-មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់និងឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាមក្នុងពេលបំពេញការងារម៉ោងការងារ- ធ្វើការ៦ថ្ងៃ/សប្តាហ៏ ឈប់សំរាក១ថ្ងៃក្នុងមួយសប្តាហ៏- ម៉ោងការងារ វេណព្រឹក ម៉ោង០៣:៣០ព្រឹកដល់ ម៉ោង១២:០០រសៀលអត្ថប្រយោជន៏- ផ្តល់ជូនអាហារពីរពេល-​ កម្មវិធីខួបកំណើត- ទទួលបានការចូលរួមវគ្គសិក្ខាសាលា វគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងកម្មវិធីបំពាក់បំប៉នផ្សេងៗ- មានឱកាសឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្ស តាមសមត្ថភាពការងារ និងបទពិសោធន- កម្មវិធីជប់លៀងបុគ្គលិកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ- អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗទៀត
Company Profile: Bayon Bakery is a local and one of the leading bakeries in Cambodia and was established in 1998. In order to fulfill customer's demands, we have expanded our stores to 12 branches in Phnom Penh with our signature Num Pang Bayon, Bakyong Bayon, cake, wedding cake, and a wide range of fresh baked products.

job title: អ្នកបើកបរម៉ូតូកង់បី
company_name: ហាងនំបុ័ងបាយ័ន Bayon Bakery
position: អ្នកបើកបរម៉ូតូកង់បី
Job Description: ទំនួលខុសត្រូវការងារ-បើកបរដឹកជញ្ជូននំ និង ទំនិញផ្សេងៗទៅតាមសាខា ក្នុងរាជធានីភ្នំពេញ ប្រកបដោយ សុវត្ថិភាព និងគោរពច្បាប់ចរាចរណ៍- ត្រួតពិនិត្យឡានជាប្រចាំ មានដូចជា ប្រេងម៉ាស៊ីន ទឹក ប្រាំង ចង្កូត កង់ឡាន មុននឹងចេញដំណើរ ព្រមទាំងត្រួតពិនិត្យជាប្រចាំ តាមកាលវិភាគកំណត់របស់ប្រធានផ្នែកប្រតិបត្តិការ- ត្រូវរាប់ និងផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ទំនិញឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ មុនពេលលើកទំនិញដាក់ម៉ូតូ និងរក្សាទំនិញក្នុងកន្លែងផ្ទុកឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ- រាយការណ៍ភ្លាមៗមកកាន់ប្រធានក្រុមក្នុងករណីមានបញ្ហាកើតឡើងនៅពេលដឹកជញ្ជូន-ទទួលការងារផ្សេងទៀតតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ប្រធានក្រុម ឬអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង និង ថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំ។
Job Requirement: តម្រូវការការងារ-ចេះអានអក្សរខ្មែរបាន-ត្រូវមានប័ណ្ណបើកបរត្រឹមត្រូវស្របតាមច្បាប់-ត្រូវមានជំនាញនិងបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិចមួយឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ-មានការយល់ដឹងអំពីច្បាប់ចរាចរណ៍ផ្លូវគោកតម្រូវការ-មានការប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងល្អ និងអាចបត់បែនទៅលើម៉ោងធ្វើការបាន-មានភាពអត់ធ្មត់ និងឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាមក្នុងការងារ។-អាចធ្វើការជាក្រុម ម្នាក់ឯង និងអាចធ្វើការងារក្រោមសំពាធបាន។-មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់នៅពេលបើកបរ(បើកបរដោយប្រុងប្រយ័ត្នខ្ពស់និងប្រកបដោយស្មារតីទទួលខុសត្រូវ)។-មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់និងឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាមក្នុងពេលបំពេញការងារម៉ោងការងារ- ធ្វើការ៦ថ្ងៃ/សប្តាហ៏ ឈប់សំរាក១ថ្ងៃក្នុងមួយសប្តាហ៏- ម៉ោងការងារ វេណព្រឹក ម៉ោង០៣:០០ព្រឹកដល់ ម៉ោង១២:០០រសៀលអត្ថប្រយោជន៏- ផ្តល់ជូនអាហារពីរពេល-​ កម្មវិធីខួបកំណើត- ទទួលបានការចូលរួមវគ្គសិក្ខាសាលា វគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងកម្មវិធីបំពាក់បំប៉នផ្សេងៗ- មានឱកាសឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្ស តាមសមត្ថភាពការងារ និងបទពិសោធន- កម្មវិធីជប់លៀងបុគ្គលិកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ- អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗទៀតមានតែបេក្ខជនដែលជាប់ក្នុងបញ្ជីសម្រាំងប៉ុណ្ណោះនឹងត្រូវបានទាក់ទងសម្រាប់ការសំភាសន៍។ សូមផ្ញើរប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប និងលិខិតចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ របស់អ្នកទុកជាឯកសារមួយ។ ដាក់ឈ្មោះឯកសាររបស់អ្នកដូចតទៅ: ឈ្មោះ_មុខដំណែងស្នើសុំ_កាលបរិច្ឆេទដាក់ពាក្យ (ឈ្មោះ = ឈ្មោះពេញរបស់អ្នក) ។ ឧទាហរណ៏: លី ដារ៉ា_បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកលក់_ថ្ងៃទី30 ខែកក្កដា ឆ្នាំ2019។ សូមភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនឹងអត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណ សំបុត្រកំណើត និងសៀវភៅគ្រួសារដែលមានភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប និងលិខិតចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍។

Job Description:
• Contact, set up/join meetings with potential clients and listen to their requirement and problem
• Work with team (designer, developer and/or management) to find and propose solution to potential clients
• Develop quotes, proposals, contract and related documents for clients
• Prepare and deliver appropriate presentation on products and services to internal teams and clients
• Be a negotiator and consensus builder between company and client
• Gather feedback from clients or prospects and share with internal teams
• Maintain fruitful relationships with existing clients by keeping contact and follow up for project progress and solution
• Attend conferences, exhibitions, workshop, training and other event on behalf of the company
• Execute other tasks assigned by supervisor and manager
Job Requirement:
• Graduate in Business or any related fields
• Good computer skills such as Word, Excel, PowerPoint and Email
• Experience in the related fields (Sale, IT and Customer service) is a plus
• Good in Khmer & English, both written and spoken.
• Strong communication, leadership skills, negotiation and interpersonal skills
• Someone open to learn and that wants to grow in organization
• Be a problem solver, able to work under pressure with high responsibility

Benefit:
- Working Hours: Mon-Fri, 8AM-5PM
- Annual Staff Retreat
- 2-3 times party per year
- Coffee Corner (free coffee) for relax and discussion
- Yearly bonus by KPI
- 2 times performance feedback by manager to improve  your skill and performance
- Seniority payment (ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារ)
- Yearly salary review and promote 1-2 times per year      if excess expectation and performance
- NSSF (Accident & Health)
- Phone & Gasoline

Job Description:
•	Ensure all lab results are released accurately on time.
•	Manage and prepare workflow process to assure reliable results and pre-defined TAT.
•	Validate and be responsible for all lab results 
•	Lab supervisor leads senior lab techs, lab staff and be lab manager interim when he/she is absent.
Monitoring and improve the performance and productivity of Lab team. 
•	Develop adequate SOPs to determine the accuracy, precision, other performance of the method and bio-risk management.
•	Create work environment that encourages all staff to participate actively in the growth of the business 
•	Supervise and be sure that all approved SOPs are applied properly.
•	Ensure that all SOPs applied are compliant to the good practice in laboratory standard (ISO 15189) and supervise actively in corrective action plans 
•	Participate in a quality control and quality assurance program is established and maintained 
•	Manage, review and maintain workflow process, new methodologies and instrumentation to contribute for more efficient and effective operation.
•	Assist in patient consultation and result interpretation. 
•	Lead and direct the development, communication and implementation of effective growth strategy and processes. 
•	Prepare safety and security initiative, plan improvement and streamline laboratory operational plan to achieve higher efficiency of the lab. 
•	Oversee and train lab technicians and assistants on the correct use of lab equipment and provide technical instructions to all staff
•	Manage the company gross margin developments and take proactive or preventive measures to enhance overall profitability.
•	Ensure all contracts or orders meet customer specific requirements and contractual scope. 
•	Supervise and participate in costing review and managing expenses in lab (reagent & storage, avoid contamination and damaging before shelf life of reagents), consumables, electricity. 
•	Assist with lab manager (interviewing, hiring, employee planning, evaluation staff competencies, performance reviews)
•	Manage underperforming members of the lab team in cooperation with lab manager.
•	Ensure that all information from bottom –up and vice versa have been transferred transparently and discussed freely across the company.
•	Participate and develop informatics management system replying to customer satisfactions
•	Control all Lab expenses to ensure that all expenses are accurately recorded and filed
•	Respect for client’s and patient’s confidentiality.
•	Work on other assignments which assign by lab manager.
Job Requirement:
•	Doctor of pharmacy or MD specialized in Medical Biology (with thesis is preference)
•	1 years of laboratory and supervisory experience preferred
•	Possess a strong supervisory aptitude with a proven track record of success in coordinating/participating in daily operations, tracking performance and process improvement.
•	Proficiency with computers and basic office software (MS Word, Excel, Outlook) including experience with computer-based laboratory information system software.
•	Ability to organize and prioritize multiple tasks/staffs simultaneously.
•	Must possess excellent interpersonal communication skills
•	Be able to lead and direct others
•	Be able to develop strategic and action plan of laboratory
•	Honest and High Commitment

Job Description:
Key Responsibilities:

• Implement national and regional channel/account strategies which in line with overall modern trade strategies
• Arrange regular business performance reviews with customers, implement the identified initiatives to drive additional growth engine responsible channels
• Prepare all key modern trade customers’ Trading Terms Agreement (TTA)/commercial contract and submit for review and approval
• Drive the growth of the responsible channels (MT) to meet or exceed agreed target. Keeps updated with new outlet opening and outlets closing to reduce possible exposure to bad debt
• Maintain great customer relationship in order to earn trust and generate profitable repetitive business as well as potential new/additional opportunities
• Utilize resources/budget to fund portfolio growth initiatives which in line with overall growth strategies of the Modern Trade Business
• Execute of modern trade sale & marketing strategies and ensure the transparency of the trade promotions programs and events
• Monitor customers’ Accounts Receivables and ensure customer payment according to agreed limits and work closely with finance team to ensure bad debt exposure is minimize 
• Building and maintaining relationships, communicating effectively, Influences the System, Drives Innovative Business Improvements, Develops & Inspires Others, Builds Vision and Strategy, Ethics and integrity
• Demonstrate Coca-Cola leadership behaviour: “Set the Agenda” “Be a Role Model” “Help Others Achieve their Best Selves” with Growth Culture Mindset
Job Requirement:
Requirements:

• Full compressive knowledge in products & service as well as organization
• Good in customer relationship development, maintenance, and management
• Good in negotiation and persuasion with win-win attitude and solution provider
• Great & productive business networking with great abilities to identify key personal in various organization
• Good communicator (verbal, written, storytelling, presentation etc.)
• Commercial & Sales Knowledge
• Decision making and advance problem-solving 
• Numerical and analytical abilities, with demonstrated ability to use Pivot tables and other analytical functions
• Minimum 2 years of working experience in the FMCG companies, preferably in beverage manufacturing and distribution
Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.

Job Description:
Job purpose
Accountable for the overall function of the limousine service and dispatch vehicles and drivers to meet customer’s transportation needs. Conveys a high profile of the company by being neatly dressed and offering quality customer service courteously.

General Functions
 Ensures adherence to NagaWorld’s Code of Conduct, Internal Rules and Regulations at all times by constituent/s
 Adhere to Transport daily operation (manpower allotment, assigned areas, transport arrangement, immigration and airline arrangement)
 Prepare a copy of vehicle documentation inside vehicle (road tax, car inspection, car registration and insurance)
 Knowledgeable of Nagaworld facilities and amenities rendered to guest/s (product knowledge)
 Implementation of health and safety hygiene measures to guest/s and subordinates to avoid health risk hazard (ready face mask and alco-gel, if needed)
 Monitor and maintain amenities for guest/s in vehicle (wet tissue, umbrella, drinking water and towel)
 Notify superior immediately regarding guest/s concern/s
 Handle guest concerns properly by own capacity (notify superior immediately if unable to handle issue)
 Avoid causing inconvenience to guest, provide immediate solution when necessary
 Performs other duties as assigned by management.
 Securely transport guest/s passport from airport to VIP office in NagaWorld (All guest/s passport are placed in a secured lock bag and recorded prior to transfer process)
 Adherence to confidentiality policy (all guest’s personal details and information strictly private and confidential)
 Provide best convenience to arriving VIP guest/s while inside the vehicle
 Knowledgeable of tourist destination and landmarks
 Knowledgeable and updated on road access and Cambodian traffic laws
 Handle guest/s concern professionally, report any incident to Superior
 Prepares maps, directions, and other related materials inside vehicle;
 Anticipates and monitors schedule changes and adjusts resources accordingly; (quick response to scenarios, providing limo driver/s alternative routes)
 Communicates with colleagues directly or via radio to assist in the execution of their assignments;
 Interacts with Customer Service to receive and provide up to date information on reservation changes;
 Liaise with concerned VIP support team for VIP guest/s arrival and departure schedule.
 Maintain all H1 vehicles in tip top condition (report to superior for any issues)
 Responsible for caring for company vehicles and property (report to superior for any issues)
 Follow assigned schedule and roster (notify superior for any changes)
 Ensure proper grooming prior to heading to assigned area
 Understand and follow basic operational procedures of the department
 Clearly handover information to colleagues and superior/s
 Knowledge on basic repair of vehicle break down
 Give courtesy and treat guest politely at all times
 Ensure provide guest/s with service standards
 Have pass medical check with good eyesight and health
 Follow timely and accurate daily schedule
 Abide by Cambodian traffic laws (rule and regulations)
 Ensure to be qualified and have a professional driving license
 Adherence to company / department policies and procedure
 Follow road safety procedure

Job Description:
Job Brief: to provide secretarial, accounting and administrative support services to the Office Leader.

** Duties and Responsibilities:
As Secretary for a small office based in Phnom Penh, Cambodia and the other staffs based on site, the candidate will perform the full range of typical financial management, administrative management and Human resources duties.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree in Accounting or Finance or relevant qualification (Student studying Tax Agent,  ACCA are encouraged).
- 5 years post graduate experience in the field.
- Be able to use MS Office programmers.
- Knowledge of accounting procedure and formats.
- Taxation Knowledge will be considered preferentially.
- High computer literacy with strong excel skill for financial modelling.
- Good command of spoken and written English (students studying ACE or with TOFEL are encouraged).
- Honest, Hardworking, flexible and high responsibility.
- Be patient and be a good team player.
Company Profile:
Start your career at Arup, listed in Engineering News Record as one of the top “Best Green Design Firms”, “Top Global Design Firms”, and featured on Fortune Magazine's "Change The World" list of companies that are making the world a better place.

Arup is an independent engineering and consulting firm of 14,000 people in 42 countries around the world. Founded in 1946, we are the creative force at the heart of many of the world’s most prominent projects in the built environment, including the Sydney Opera House, the London Eye, and the Beijing National Stadium (aka the Bird's Nest).

During your career at Arup, you’ll have the chance to engage in a fulfilling career and work with some of the most highly respected engineers and specialists in the world. You’ll also get the opportunity to work on exciting and significant projects, delivering quality work that has a positive and lasting influence on the community and the environment.
Contact Info: Contact Information Thomas Zazworka  023 963 103 phnompenh@arup.com Room 301, 3rd Floor Vattanac Capital No. 66 Preah Monivong Boulevard, Phnom Penh 12000, Cambodia 023 963 103

Job Description: • ទទួលផែនការពីប្រធានផ្នែកអំពីការងារដែលត្រូវជួលជុល• ផ្តល់ព័ត៌មានទៅប្រធានផ្នែកពីគុណភាពគ្រឿង• របាយការណ៍ជូនប្រធានផ្នែកវិញនូវចំនុចដែលខូចខាត ដើម្បីពិភាក្សាជួសជុល ឬផ្លាស់ប្តូរ• ដាក់លិខិតស្នើសុំទៅកាន់ផ្នែកឃ្លាំងតាមរយៈប្រធានផ្នែកដើម្បីស្នើសុំសម្ភារៈ• ការជួសជុលត្រូវផ្តោតទៅលើពេលវេលា គុណភាព សោភ័ណភាព និងសុវត្ថិភាពខ្ពស់• សរុបរបាយការណ៍ជូនប្រធានផ្នែកនូវសកម្មភាពពេលបញ្ចប់ការជួសជុល• សម្អាតបរិវេណ និងរថយន្ត ឱ្យមានសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ពេលបញ្ចប់ការជួសជុល• ត្រូវជួយការងារដល់ជាងដទៃទៀតនៅពេលដែលមិនទាន់ទទួលបានផែនការពីប្រធានផ្នែក• ត្រូវបញ្ចប់ការងារដែលខ្លួនបានធ្វើទោះបីជាដល់ម៉ោងចេញក៏ដោយ• អាចមកធ្វើការថ្ងៃឈប់សម្រាកប្រសិនជាមានការស្នើសុំពីប្រធានផ្នែក• បាញ់ថ្នាំឡានគ្រប់ប្រភេទ• បាញ់ថ្នាំលើទ្វាររ៉ូត• លាយថ្នាំបាញ់ឱ្យស៊ីពណ៌សាច់ឡាន• បៀកកាវឱ្យស្មើរសាច់ដែក• ខាតកាវបៀកឱ្យស្មើរសាច់ដែក• ឆាបដែកឱ្យស្មើរគ្នា• សម្អាតតួរថយន្តឱ្យស្អាតមុន និងបាញ់ថ្នាំ ឬបាញ់ស្លាកសញ្ញា• បិទក្រដាសកាសែតកន្លែងដែលមិនត្រូវបាញ់ថ្នាំ កុំឱ្យសាចថ្នាំប្រឡាក់• សហការជាមួយលេខាធិការយានដ្ឋាន អំពីតម្រូវការ ការស្ទីកគ័របាញ់ថ្នាំ• បាញ់ថ្នាំយ៉ាន់ និងតាបួររថយន្ត• តោនឱ្យស្មើរសាច់ដែក និងភ្លី• ប្តូរមេឡានពុក• តោន បាត សាច់ជញ្ជាំង ដំបូល និង ទ្វាររថយន្ត• រៀបចំលួសទុកសម្រាប់ផ្សា• កាត់ដំបូលក្បាលឡាន ទុកសម្រាប់ប៉ះកន្លែងខូចខាតរបស់រថយន្ត• រៀបចំផ្លាស់ប្តូរ ថ្មស្អុយ និងអុកស៊ីសែន• រៀបចំកៅស៊ូមេ ប្រឡុង ខ្ចៅ វីស• លាបឡាំងកូតបាតរថយន្ត• បិទស្ទីកគ័រលើឡាន កញ្ចក់ ដែក ម៉ាស៊ីនភ្លើង ការ៉ូ• រៀបចំដែកកេះ ស្កុតក្រដាស កំបិតតូច ធំ• រៀបចំបិទស្ទីកគ័រកាត់រូបភាព អក្សរ និងក្រដាសគំរូត្រូវបិទ• រៀបចំក្រណាត់ទុកជូត
Job Requirement: • ធ្លាក់ ឬជាប់ថ្នាក់ទី12• មានអាយុចាប់ពី 18 ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ• បទពិសោធន៍ការងារពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹងការងារបើកបរ យ៉ាងហោចណាស់ 1 ឆ្នាំ• អាចបត់បែនតាមពេលវេលា ម៉ោងធ្វើការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ការងារមិនមានដែនកំណត់• មានការព្យាយាម ភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ និងការលះបង់ខ្ពស់• មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ• មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ• មានចំណេះដឹងក្នុងការដឹកនាំក្រុម ចេះនិយាយ ចេះសរសេរអក្សរខ្មែរបានរបៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQE ឬ ដាក់ពាក្យផ្ទាល់តាមរយៈអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ #223 & 227 ផ្លូវម៉ៅសេទុង សង្កាត់ទួលស្វាយព្រៃ១ ខណ្ឌបឹងកេងកង រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh #11A, St. 402, Sangkat Tumnup Teuk, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh. 012 797 939

Job Requirement: ** សូមទំនាក់ទំនងព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម ៖- ទូរសព្ទលេខ : (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564 - គេហទំព័រ : https://mjqjobs.com/- អាសយដ្ឋាន : អគារលេខ 140 & 210, មហាវិថីម៉ៅសេទុង រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ ព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជា

•	Have responsibility all tasks for Achieving Sales Target and Increasing Customer Satisfaction of Store.
•	Completes store operational requirements by scheduling and assigning employees; following up on work results.
•	Maintains store staff by recruiting, selecting, orienting, and training employees.
•	Maintains store staff job results by coaching, counseling, and disciplining employees; planning, monitoring, and appraising job results.
•	Achieves financial objectives by preparing and scheduling expenditures; analyzing variances; initiating corrective actions.
•	Identifies current and future customer requirements by establishing rapport with potential and actual customers and other persons in a position to understand service requirements.
•	Ensures availability of merchandise and services by approving contracts; maintaining inventories.
•	Formulates pricing policies by reviewing merchandising activities; determining additional needed sales promotion; authorizing clearance sales; studying trends.
•	Markets merchandise by studying advertising, sales promotion, and display plans;
•	Protects employees and customers by providing a safe and clean store environment.
•	Maintains the stability and reputation of the store by complying with legal requirements.
•	Determines marketing strategy changes by reviewing operating and financial statements and departmental sales records.
•	Other tasks assigned by the Japanese Management.

Working Day/Hour
•	Monday- Friday: 8:00-17:00 (5.5days/week)
•	Saturday: 8:00-12:00
•	Following the public holidays

Allowance & Benefits
•	Transport Allowance: Include in basic salary
•	Annual Leave: 18 days
•	NSSF: Yes
•	Seniority Payment: Yes (7.5days/6month)
•	Bonus 1 time per year
Depend on the company's business results and performance of employee

•	Language: English: Business Level

•	Market Knowledge

•	Strategic Planning
•	Management Proficiency
•	Client Relationships

Job Description:
- Develop and organize the learning materials for students
- Be creative and use proper teaching methodology (songs, stories, educational games, arts & craft, etc.)
- Motivate children’s abilities through playing
- Dealing complaint with parents if needed on students’ learning through providing appropriate information/ solution

- Cooperate with other departments’ staff
- Follow and comply the safety standard regulations
- Supervision TAs and children during snack time, outdoor play, swimming and other activities
Job Requirement: #NAME?
Company Profile: Our vision as a school is to prepare and equip our young people with the knowledge, skills, understanding, and attitude to thrive and then take on the world.Our mission is to provide exceptional care and education to children while fostering each child’s intellectual, social, physical, emotional, and moral development in an academic-rich environment.The curriculum at BISPP has derived from Vision and Mission statements, along with our definition of teaching and learning adapted from the International Early Year Curriculum (IEYC) and Cambridge Curriculum. These curriculums are to ensure great learning, great teaching, and great fun and to prepare our young children to take on the world. Teaching and learning: BISPP is seeking to develop self-esteem and pleasure in learning through a stimulating, supportive and happy environment that provides all students and staff with opportunities to achieve their full potential in knowledge, skills, understanding, and behavior to be globally competitive. Personal development: BISPP values punctuation, honesty, creativity, kindness, independence, and interdependence, communication, exploring, healthy living, trust, and tolerance. Respect: BISPP is requiring our staff and students to show respect for ourselves, other people, our environment, school property, and individual property.

Job Description:
1. Daily costing operation supporting
-Daily operation supporting with document attached and follow up and record subcontractor
-Update posting report BOM & BOQ
-Review receipts and compare with actual charges to detect inaccuracies
-Cost pricing / invoicing of inventory to related parties
-Regularly follow up with all project to obtain any revised BOM & BOQ before project started
-Inventory costing, including construction material and tool
2. Closed monthly cost report
-Posting cost report in system timely basic
-Spot check document attached and record to make sure it corrected
-Posting subcontractor and reconcile data posted both manual and system
-Coordinated in monthly physical stock count, input and reconcile with warehouse.
-Ensure monthly cost of goods sold by project accurate
-Weekly spot check stock movement at all project.
-Report discrepancy and coach warehouse supervisor/manager to do the stock count
-Coordinate to get month-end stock balance from all project by 3rd of the month. 
-Verify and input into system for month-end cost calculation.
-Labor cost control by project and allocate cost with job card.
-Closed tool movement report by timely.
-Provide variance report for subcontractor and worker by monthly.
3. Other cost report supporting
-Support management for other reporting
-Regularly follow up with all project to obtain any revised BOM & BOQ before project
-Report to ACM the inventory/subcontractor reconciles sub ledger with G/L
-Other tasks assigned by Cost Account Manager
Job Requirement:
-Bachelor Degree in Accounting or other related fields.
-At least 3 years of experience in managing inventory and costing in the system and fixed assets
-Be proficient in excel skill
-Good communication and analytical skill
-Be patient, self-motivated and team building
-Willing to stay to complete all the work assigned during tough deadline.


Benefits:
- Seniority
- KPI Bonus
- Phone Allowance
- Annual leave
- Sick Leave
- Special Leave
- Public holidays (Labor Law)
- Insurance (NSSF)

Job Description:
 Prepare monthly credit control report to present a complete information of monthly bill printed, charges,
payments and unpaid amounts within first week of the month.
 Validate each monthly bill printed to ensure there is no missing bill.
 Arrange the team to get the bills packed and delivered within 7days after bill printed.
 Keep monitor the delivery reports from agency/messenger to ensure completeness of delivery process.
 Assist in daily complains handling, and provide appropriate support to relevant team includes accounting,
contact center, sales as well as customers to facilitate the collection process (bill inquiry, bill resent! re-print,
payment validation, account summary, bar/unbar with temporary credit limit adjustment etc.).
 Validation on payment transactions indicate by accounting team, identify correct customer's account, and
provide proper detail to facilitation payment booking.
 Strong internal control and no loophole or weakness
 Based on pre-defined schedules, perform the actions includes Send batch SMS alert, Calling, Baring and
deletions of the accounts where appropriate.
 Accurately and timely tracking of manual dunning and SOPs under Credit control
 Perform other tasks as assigned by management
Job Requirement:
 Degree in Banking and Finance or accounting
 At least 3 years experience in account receivable.
 Good understanding in standard accounting operation
 Experience in documentation, reporting and organizational skills
 English proficiency
 Computer literacy
 Dynamic, innovative and able to work independently

Qualified applicants may submit their CVs and cover letters to the Human Resources Department.
The Human Resources Department
CamGSM Co., Ltd.
No. 33 Preah Sihanouk Blvd., Phnom Penh
Tel. 017 333 589 | 077 906 555 | 077 907 555
Email: careers@cellcard.com.kh
Company Profile:
As Cambodia’s longest-serving and only 100% locally owned mobile communications company, Cellcard has more than 24 years of service to the Kingdom maintaining a customer base of more than 4 million subscribers.

Cellcard launched in 1997 in a joint venture with Millicom International Cellular providing its customers with the first prepaid service with scratchcards.

What followed for Cellcard was a number of firsts in the market such as introducing SMS, Value-Added Services, a dedicated Loyalty program, roaming services and a credit sharing platform.

Cellcard is Cambodia’s most-awarded mobile network having achieved more than 30 industry awards for network excellence including an impressive six consecutive Ookla Speedtest awards and a number of category wins from Opensignal including Best Games Experience in February 2020.

It’s most recent market firsts include the Cellcard Network Guarantee launched in 2017 reimbursing any customer who experiences a dropped call, the award-winning App-based Super Data Race held each year since 2017 and its move to lead the esports agenda in 2018 followed in 2019 with Cambodia’s first virtual gamer platform PlayGame and the first tailormade gamer data plan PlayGame Unlimited.

In February 2021, Cellcard revealed its latest innovation, the Pouk Mak chat app, the world’s first major Khmer languaged messaging App.

A major focus for Cellcard now is its evolution to 5G for consumers and enterprise, including Smart City applications across Fintech and web security, data privacy, public safety and security, environment protection, education, healthcare and e-government.

In terms of 5G network readiness, Cellcard has conducted numerous live tests on its stand-alone site reaching speeds of 1.8 gigabytes per second. These are Cambodia’s first and only tests conducted on a real end-to-end with 5G radio to a 5G core network able to accommodate network slicing for dedicated use cases.

Company Profile:
A Singapore Brand, A Global Business 

With a corporate history that extends more than a hundred years, Yeo’s (also known as YHS or Yeo Hiap Seng) has grown from strength to strength, from its humble beginnings as a striving enterprise in pre-war Singapore, to its transformation as a food & beverage conglomerate with a global network that spans Asia-Pacific, Europe, North America and Oceanic regions. 

A category leader in the Asian drinks market, Yeo’s has broadened its customer reach and entrenched its industry presence through a combination of geographical expansion and product diversification. On the beverage business front, Yeo’s competitive advantage lies in the Group’s ability to stay true and current to consumers’ changing palettes and individual preferences based on lifestyle and cultural differences. 

With a century of heritage, the Yeo's brand bears the hallmark of superior product quality. Yeos is committed to meeting evolving consumer needs and growing market demands through continued product innovation. 

We are honored to have won following awards in the recent two years: 
2017 Singapore Prestige Brand Award - Most Popular Regional Brand Overall Winner; 
2017 Singapore Prestige Brand Award - Regional Brands; 
2018 The Brand Laureate World Halal Brand Award 2018 - Best Brands in FMCG - Food & Beverage.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR & Admin   023 989 181 hrkh@yeos.com Phnom Penh Special Economic Zone, National Road #4,  Phum Tachet, Sangkat Beung Thom, Khan Kambol, Phnom Penh 023 989 181

Job Description:

Job Description:
• Design, test, implement new and update Cellcard’s digital assets
• Responsible for architecting those applications, research on technologies and best practices
• Design and build App using native/cross-platform technology and quality reusable backend REST API.
• Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
• Collaborate with a team to define, design, and ship new features.
• Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
• Maintain code quality, organization, and automation.
• Delivers projects on time, and conduct knowledge sharing.
• Interact with and manage out-sourcing vendors and staff to complete development projects.
• Consistently applies generally accepted programming standards and techniques to assure efficient program logic and data manipulation.
• Involvement in end-to-end Software Development Life Cycle from Start to the launching the Project.
• Diagnose and resolve software problems quickly and efficiently.
• Performs other tasks as assigned by management
Job Requirement:
• Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related fields
• At least 3years of technology experience in web development.
• Knowledge of HTML/CSS, PHP, and WordPress.
• A solid understanding of how web applications work including security, session management, and best development practices.
• Understanding on of RESTful APIs JSON Web Token modern authorization mechanisms, the document request model, and offline storage.
• Experience with agile development practices and Scrum, Git and Jira, CI/CD and DevOps.
• English proficiency
• Dynamic, innovative and able to work independently

It’s most recent market firsts include the Cellcard Network Guarantee launched in 2017 reimbursing any customer who experiences a dropped call, the award-winning App-based Super Data Race held each year since 2017 and its move to lead the esports agenda in 2018 followed in 2019 with Cambodia’s first virtual gamer platform PlayGame and the first tailormade gamer data plan PlayGame Unlimited.

In February 2021, Cellcard revealed its latest innovation, the Pouk Mak chat app, the world’s first major Khmer languaged messaging App.

A major focus for Cellcard now is its evolution to 5G for consumers and enterprise, including Smart City applications across Fintech and web security, data privacy, public safety and security, environment protection, education, healthcare and e-government.

In terms of 5G network readiness, Cellcard has conducted numerous live tests on its stand-alone site reaching speeds of 1.8 gigabytes per second. These are Cambodia’s first and only tests conducted on a real end-to-end with 5G radio to a 5G core network able to accommodate network slicing for dedicated use cases.

Job Description:
• To attend in machine breakdown, troubleshoot problems, upgrading or modification, and ensure full compliance to safety procedure, food safety management, hygiene procedures and 5S execution.
• To ensure spare parts are available and highlight to Maintenance Manager on the requirements also to responsible to alert the Maintenance Manager of any unusual occurrence and /or damage that have taken place or may occur
• To be fully responsible on performance of the machine and participate actively in problem solving and process improvement initiatives, identify, evaluate, analyze and implement actions required to achieve Mechanical Efficiency targets.
• Conduct performance evaluation and handles discipline of employees as needed and in accordance with company policy
• To execute maintenance plan, coaching maintenance staff and performs other related duties as assigned by Maintenance Manager
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s Degree in mechanical and electrical engineering from a recognized university or polytechnic or equivalent qualification
• At least 5 years of maintenance experience (mechanical and electrical in industrial) is required
• Extensive knowledge of industrial maintenance (mechanic, electrical, hydraulic, pneumatic, automation, control system, instrumentation)
• Excellent analytical, problem-solving skills, 5S, drive improvement, planning and leadership abilities
• Ability to identify issues and determine repairs that are needed.
• Good physical condition and strength with a willingness to work overtime
• Ability to plan maintenance schedules for building systems.
• Excellent management, communication and supervisory skills, interpersonal skills
• Good physical condition and strength with a willingness to work overtime
• Flexible and be able to work on shift
• Computer knowledge (SAP, MS. Office, and AutoCAD drawing, PLC) and control system
• Be able to communicate in English (Speaking, Listening, Writing)
• Personality and attitude (Reliable, Flexible, Strong commitment, Ownership, Accountabilities, Patience, Initiative, Honesty, Quick response)

** If you are interested, please send your CV to hrkh@yeos.com or YHS (Cambodia) Food & Beverage Pte Ltd, Phnom
- Penh Special Economic Zone (PPSEZ), National Road #4, 
Phum Tachet, Sangkat Beung Thom, Khan Kambol, Phnom Penh.
